summary: Working at Infosys Ltd. since June 2014 as Front-end web developer.

Interacting with 3rd party APIs and consuming RESTful APIs.

Components based UI development.subHeading: Building app using small, independent and reusable components
detail: Separating rendering UI and network services in ES6 or typescript modules
Using webpack for bundling and preprocessing

Responsive layout design.subHeading: Adjusting the app behaviour for different screen sizes
detail: Using media queries, grid and flexbox
Lazy loading optimized resources as per screen size

Cross Browser compatibility.subHeading: Rendering similar visuals across different browsers
detail: Using appropriate polyfills for unsupported APIs

Progressive Web Apps.subHeading: Providing native mobile app behavior and offline viewing
detail: Using service worker, web manifest and caching
Try going offline and refresh this page
Separate compressed bundle of critical resources for first paint
Async loading of resources as required

Unit testing.subHeading: Writing unit tests to ensure quality check
detail: Automatic run of unit tests on every code push
Customized framework of Jasmine, Karma and Istanbul code coverage

Test automation.subHeading: Easing tester's work by automating test cases for regression
detail: Understanding regression test cases from core testing team and automating it
Framework consisted of Cucumber, protractor, webdriver and grunt
